items.content_html: This project is a lightweight Instagram Stories feature built using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. It allows users to view small profile pictures and click on them to reveal a full-size story, which disappears after a few seconds.

items.content_html: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.

With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
